title: ClipCache
description: Schema for the shared cache containing CLIP embeddings and related media metadata.

ClipCacheEntry.title: ClipCacheEntry
ClipCacheEntry.description: An entry in the CLIP cache, associated with a specific file path.

schemaVersion.description: Version of the schema this entry conforms to.

filePath.description: Absolute path of the original media file (redundant if key is path, but can be useful).

mtime.description: Modification timestamp (Unix epoch milliseconds) of the source file when the embedding was generated.

fileSize.description: Size of the source file in bytes.

duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds (null for images).

embeddingModel.description: Identifier for the CLIP model used (e.g., 'openai/clip-vit-base-patch32').

numFrames.description: Number of frames used for video embedding (null for images).

samplingMethod.description: Method used for sampling video frames (e.g., 'uniform', 'advanced').

processingTimestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the embedding was generated.

debugMetadata.description: Optional debug information from the embedding process.

error.description: Optional error message if embedding generation failed.

seenCount.description: How many times this media item has been shown to the user.

lastSeenAt.description: Unix timestamp (ms) of the most recent time the item was displayed.
